title: The Tatami Galaxy - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Anime   Anti-social Protagonist   Antihero Protagonist   Apartment Life   Arrogant Characters   Awkward Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   College/University   Delusions   Flashbacks   Friendship   Gods   Hikikomori   Interconnected Storylines   Living Alone   Loneliness   Love at First Sight   Manipulative Characters   Mythology   Parallel Worlds   Sharp-tongued Characters   Youkai
author: Morimi Tomihiko   森見登美彦
description:
I am an unfulfilled third year university student. Led on by my frenemy Ozu; pushed around by the preposterous demands of the mysterious, freewheeling Master Higuchi; unable to approach the beautiful, aloof maiden Akashi; I find myself far from the rosy campus life I had dreamed of. If this is how it's going to be, I had rather return to my sparkling days as a freshman and do it all over again!

A rambling chronicle that sends you hurtling through four parallel realities on a bittersweet journey through youth. >
